backend/main.mo: Defines data models for salons, bookings, images, and users, seeds default Swiss salons, and mixes in authorization and storage logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing two V53 AppV1 overwrite tasks and required mechanical fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions summarizing their UI or logic roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions with OKLCH colors and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with root div and script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps and renders AppV1 as the main React application.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Large V53 Olympus UI file defining showreel, Swiss DB, presets, seed data, and full frontend interaction logic.
frontend/src/components/AuthHeader.tsx: Placeholder file for the authentication header component.
Placeholder file for the salon creation form component.
frontend/src/components/MemberCard.tsx: Placeholder file for the loyalty member card component.
frontend/src/components/MonopolyModeSwit: Placeholder file for the monopoly mode toggle component.
frontend/src/components/MotionButton.tsx: Placeholder file for the animated tactile button wrapper.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBadge.tsx: Placeholder file for the premium salon badge component.
frontend/src/components/Pressable.tsx: Placeholder file for the pressable wrapper adding scale feedback.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Placeholder file for the profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/ProSalonWizard.t: Placeholder file for the multi‑step salon creation wizard.
frontend/src/components/ProStudioCreator: Placeholder file for the pro studio creation component.
frontend/src/components/RevenueChart.tsx: Placeholder file for the revenue chart component.
frontend/src/components/SalonListSection: Placeholder file for the salon list display section.
frontend/src/components/VipDashboard.tsx: Placeholder file for the VIP dashboard component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, auto‑refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth provider, handling loading, login, delegation, and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for backend React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalonImage.ts: Placeholder file for salon image upload and retrieval logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for light/dark themes, scrollbar utilities, safe-area padding, and multiple custom animation keyframes and classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app using ReactDOM and wraps it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Generates marketing-style aura text for salons based on category, type, tags, and location using predefined templates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback and hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors mapped to CSS variables, extended utilities, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s versioned state, architectural resets, frontend/back‑end redesign goals, and known issues.
